title: Anupam Kher, Mahesh Bhatt and Shashi Tharoor join JK Rowling in Richtopia's most influential authors list
text:
Anupam Kher, Mahesh Bhatt listed in the Top 200 Richtopia’s list of most influential authors. Bollywood legends Anupam Kher and Mahesh Bhatt have made it to the Richtopia’s list of most influential authors alongside British novelist J K Rowling who is world famous for her Harry Potter series and Brazilian writer Paulo Coelho. A total of three Indians have featured in the Richtopia’s list of top 200 authors. While Anupam Kher features on the 12th position for his book ‘The Best Thing About You Is You’, Mahesh Bhatt was placed at number 78th position and the third person who has been listed is none other than politician and former diplomat Shashi Tharoor who has been ranked at number 13.
Anupam Kher recently featured in his debut short film Kheer that was released on Valentine’s Day and was must appretiated by the Bollywood fraternity. He will next be seen Sharing screen with actors like Manoj Bajpayee, Akshay Kumar and Taapsee Pannu in Naam Shabana.
Richtopic congratulated Anupam Kher and Tweeted- “@anupampkher hope you’re having a great weekend, and congrats again for being #6 on the Top 200 Authors list.” While Kher was ranked at the 12th position, the CEO of Richtopia Derin Cag, confirmed that a mistake from the end of the website in a picture made him rank at number 6, according to a Indian Express report.
